languages.text: {n}Несколько дворян окружили пожилого мужчину в камзоле. Он испуганно переводит взгляд с одного лица на другое.{/n} "Я — член уважаемой династии! Вы не можете..."{n} Он пытается подойти к кому-нибудь, но от него шарахаются, как от прокаженного.{/n}

{n}A few nobles have gathered around an older man in a fine jacket. His eyes dart back and forth between them.{/n} "I come from an honoured dynasty! You can't..." {n}He keeps trying to approach someone, but they all recoil from him as if he were a leper.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Несколько дворян окружили пожилого мужчину в камзоле. Он испуганно переводит взгляд с одного лица на другое.{/n} "Я — член уважаемой династии! Вы не можете..."{n} Он пытается подойти к кому-нибудь, но от него шарахаются, как от прокаженного.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A few nobles have surrounded an older man in a fine jacket. The man's eyes dart back and forth between the people in the group.{/n} "I come from an honoured dynasty! You can't..." {n}He keeps trying to approach someone, but they all recoil from him as if he were a leper.{/n}

{n}A few nobles have surrounded an older man in a fine jacket. The man's eyes dart back and forth between the people in the group.{/n} "I come from an honoured dynasty! You can't..." {n}He keeps trying to approach someone, but they all recoil from him as if he were a leper.{/n}

{n}A few nobles have gathered around an older man in a fine jacket. His eyes dart back and forth between them.{/n} "I come from an honoured dynasty! You can't..." {n}He keeps trying to approach someone, but they all recoil from him as if he were a leper.{/n}

{n}A few nobles have gathered around an older man in a fine jacket. His eyes dart back and forth between them.{/n} "I come from an honoured dynasty! You can't..." {n}He keeps trying to approach someone, but they all recoil from him as if he were a leper.{/n}

{n}A few nobles have gathered around an older man in a fine jacket. His eyes dart back and forth between them.{/n} "I come from an honoured dynasty! You can't..." {n}He keeps trying to approach someone, but they all recoil from him as if he were a leper.{/n}

{n}A few nobles have gathered around an older man in a fine jacket. His eyes dart back and forth between them.{/n} "I come from an honoured dynasty! You can't..." {n}He keeps trying to approach someone, but they all recoil from him as if he were a leper.{/n}

languages.text: {n}几位贵族聚集在一位穿着精致夹克的老人身边，老人的目光在几位贵族之间来回扫视。{/n}“我的家族赫赫有名！你们不能……”{n}他一直在试图接近其他贵族，但所有人都在躲着他，仿佛他得了麻风病一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A few nobles have gathered around an older man in a fine jacket. His eyes dart back and forth between them.{/n} "I come from an honoured dynasty! You can't..." {n}He keeps trying to approach someone, but they all recoil from him as if he were a leper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}几位贵族聚集在一位穿着精致夹克的老人身边，老人的目光在几位贵族之间来回扫视。{/n}“我的家族赫赫有名！你们不能……”{n}他一直在试图接近其他贵族，但所有人都在躲着他，仿佛他得了麻风病一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}数人の貴族たちが、上等な上着を着た年配の男性の周りに集まっていた。彼の目は彼らの間を行き来するように素早く動いている。{/n}「私は由緒ある名家の出だ！君たちはそんな…」{n}彼は誰かに近づこうとし続けていたが、皆はまるで彼がハンセン病患者であるかのように、彼から身を引いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A few nobles have gathered around an older man in a fine jacket. His eyes dart back and forth between them.{/n} "I come from an honoured dynasty! You can't..." {n}He keeps trying to approach someone, but they all recoil from him as if he were a leper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}数人の貴族たちが、上等な上着を着た年配の男性の周りに集まっていた。彼の目は彼らの間を行き来するように素早く動いている。{/n}「私は由緒ある名家の出だ！君たちはそんな…」{n}彼は誰かに近づこうとし続けていたが、皆はまるで彼がハンセン病患者であるかのように、彼から身を引いた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Unos cuantos nobles se han congregado en torno a un hombre mayor con una elegante chaqueta. Su mirada pasa rápidamente de unos a otros.{/n} «¡Provengo de una dinastía ilustre! No podéis...». {n}Cada vez que se acerca a alguien para hablarle, todos se apartan de él como si tuviese la lepra.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A few nobles have gathered around an older man in a fine jacket. His eyes dart back and forth between them.{/n} "I come from an honoured dynasty! You can't..." {n}He keeps trying to approach someone, but they all recoil from him as if he were a leper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unos cuantos nobles se han congregado en torno a un hombre mayor con una elegante chaqueta. Su mirada pasa rápidamente de unos a otros.{/n} «¡Provengo de una dinastía ilustre! No podéis...». {n}Cada vez que se acerca a alguien para hablarle, todos se apartan de él como si tuviese la lepra.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Birkaç soylu, şık ceketli yaşlı bir adamın etrafında toplanmış. Adamın gözleri endişeyle onların arasında gidip geliyor.{/n} "Şerefli bir hanedandanım ben! Bunu yapamazsınız..." {n}Birine yaklaşmaya çalışıyor ama hepsi ondan cüzzamlı gibi kaçıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A few nobles have gathered around an older man in a fine jacket. His eyes dart back and forth between them.{/n} "I come from an honoured dynasty! You can't..." {n}He keeps trying to approach someone, but they all recoil from him as if he were a leper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Birkaç soylu, şık ceketli yaşlı bir adamın etrafında toplanmış. Adamın gözleri endişeyle onların arasında gidip geliyor.{/n} "Şerefli bir hanedandanım ben! Bunu yapamazsınız..." {n}Birine yaklaşmaya çalışıyor ama hepsi ondan cüzzamlı gibi kaçıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Plusieurs nobles sont rassemblés autour d'un homme âge vêtu d'un pourpoint élégant qui les dévisage nerveusement.{/n} « J'appartiens à une dynastie honorable ! Vous ne pouvez pas... » {n}dit-il en tentant d'approcher les nobles qui reculent comment s'il était pestiféré.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A few nobles have gathered around an older man in a fine jacket. His eyes dart back and forth between them.{/n} "I come from an honoured dynasty! You can't..." {n}He keeps trying to approach someone, but they all recoil from him as if he were a leper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plusieurs nobles sont rassemblés autour d'un homme âge vêtu d'un pourpoint élégant qui les dévisage nerveusement.{/n} « J'appartiens à une dynastie honorable ! Vous ne pouvez pas... » {n}dit-il en tentant d'approcher les nobles qui reculent comment s'il était pestiféré.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einige Adelige haben einen älteren Mann in edler Jacke eingekreist. Sein Blick irrt zwischen ihnen hin und her.{/n} "Ich stamme aus einer ehrbaren Dynastie! Ihr könnt doch nicht ..." {n}Er versucht, sich jemandem zu nähern, aber alle weichen vor ihm zurück, als hätte er Lepra.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A few nobles have gathered around an older man in a fine jacket. His eyes dart back and forth between them.{/n} "I come from an honoured dynasty! You can't..." {n}He keeps trying to approach someone, but they all recoil from him as if he were a leper.{/n}

Ihr könnt doch nicht ..." {n}Er versucht, sich jemandem zu nähern, aber alle weichen vor ihm zurück, als hätte er Lepra.{/n}
